question: What is Open System?
options: a) To describe a state of being
b) To describe a system that is open to inclusion of many products from many resources
c) All of the mentioned
d) None of the mentioned
explanation: Open Systems describes a system that is open to inclusion of many products from many resources and its state of being.

question: Open system has interface specification consists which of the following ?
options: a) Fully defined
b) Available to public
c) Maintained according to group consensus
d) All of the mentioned
explanation: All of the mentioned are included in interface specifications.

question: Which of the following is incorrect?
options: a) The components interface specifications can be available to selected group of people

question: The benefits of open systems includes which of the following?
options: a) Reduced reliance on proprietary products
b) More competition leading to lower cost
c) Better tested products
